name: Revisit for Five Nights Saga
description:
Welcome to your Nightshift at Fredbear's Family Diner, a place of happiness and joy! You have taken the night to ensure safety of our equipment! Thanks! And, those animatronics? They, heh, wander at night, so make sure to keep them at bay.. for now..

Click here to go to GameJolt page!

This is a #FNAF game saga, so it is Free. :)
